properties.entry: SELECT EXPENSE FROM T_BUY_EXP_MAN WHERE EXPENSE_NO = (SELECT MAX(EXPENSE_NO) FROM T_BUY_EXP_MAN)
INSERT INTO T_BUY_EXP_MAN ( EXPENSE_NO, DEPOSIT, EXPENSE ) VALUES ( SEQ_EXPEQ.NEXTVAL, ?, (SELECT EXPENSE FROM T_BUY_EXP_MAN WHERE EXPENSE_NO = (SELECT MAX(EXPENSE_NO) FROM T_BUY_EXP_MAN)) + ? )
